definition: floor/floor (ie. metal plate, concrete slab, wooden planking etc)
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: The radiant ceiling cooling is a new technology with higher comfortable degree in the air-conditioning field.
sentences.chinese: 樓板輻射供冷是一種舒適度很高的新型空調技術。

sentences.english: How Do I Install an Interior Concrete Floor?
sentences.chinese: 我如何安裝一個室內混凝土樓板？。

sentences.english: The steel structure floor increase the utilization of structure space.
sentences.chinese: 鋼結構的樓板構造增大了結構空間的利用率。

sentences.english: Elsewhere, the concrete floor was simply sealed with zero-VOC epoxy.
sentences.chinese: 其他混凝土樓板也完全使用了零VOC環氧粘合劑。

sentences.english: Even the sound of a fart will shake the floor of the third floor.
sentences.chinese: 放個屁聲音大點兒三樓的樓板都震顫。

sentences.english: And so many people were hurt by heavy floor slabs, expecting the rescuers’ coming.
sentences.chinese: 還有許多被重樓板壓傷的人，期待着營救者的到來。

sentences.english: To those beams, I attached rim joists and floor joists.
sentences.chinese: 並在橫樑上附加了龍骨和樓板擱柵。

sentences.english: Plants installed below beams or floor are supported by support suspended frame.
sentences.chinese: 吊裝於梁下或樓板下的設備均採用彈性支吊架吊裝。

sentences.english: The stiffness of floor slabs in-plane is very large, and for simplification, it can be assumed as infinite.
sentences.chinese: 樓板在平面剛度很大，爲簡化計算可假定爲無窮大。

sentences.english: Put ass sound a little on the third floor large floor are tremor.
sentences.chinese: 放個屁聲音大點兒三樓的樓板都震顫。

sentences.english: The individual rooms are heated through under- floor heating with low design temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 單獨的房間通過樓板下的供暖系統加熱。

sentences.english: The elastic floors and coupling beams were regarded as the elastic support of the floor elevation.
sentences.chinese: 對彈性樓板和連梁的作用視爲樓層標高處的彈性支撐。

sentences.english: Floor fills or other special floor finishes can result in significant dead loads.
sentences.chinese: 樓板填充物或其它特殊樓板飾面會產生很大恆載。

sentences.english: Floor fills or other special floor finishes can result in significant dead loads.
sentences.chinese: 樓板填充物或其它特殊樓板飾面會產生很大恆載。

sentences.english: The cracks often appear on the top of concrete floor slab.
sentences.chinese: 現澆鋼筋混凝土樓板面易產生裂縫。

sentences.english: The floors of the building are supported by wooden beams.
sentences.chinese: 這座樓房的樓板靠木樑支撐。

definition: pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
